name: Stoneskin
flavorText: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

materialsNeeded: diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes
